title: Google\Cloud\StorageTransfer\V1\TransferSpec
name: TransferSpec
description:
Configuration for running a transfer.

Generated from protobuf message google.storagetransfer.v1.TransferSpec

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.object_conditions
params.description: Only objects that satisfy these object conditions are included in the set of data source and data sink objects. Object conditions based on objects' "last modification time" do not exclude objects in a data sink.

params.name: data.transfer_options
params.description: If the option [delete_objects_unique_in_sink][google.storagetransfer.v1.TransferOptions.delete_objects_unique_in_sink] is true and time-based object conditions such as 'last modification time' are specified, the request fails with an [INVALID_ARGUMENT][google.rpc.Code.INVALID_ARGUMENT] error.
